Title: Directs the public service commission and the Long Island power authority to extend appropriate elements of the compensation under the "Value Stack" to resources located behind customer electric meters
Summary: Directs the public service commission and the Long Island power authority to extend appropriate elements of the compensation under the "Value Stack" to resources located behind customer electric meters.
ActClause: AN ACT directing the public service commission and the Long Island power authority to extend elements of the compensation under the "Value Stack" to behind-the-meter resources
